refnamediv.refpurpose: insecure RSA public and private key encoding functions

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int i2d_Netscape_RSA(RSA *a, unsigned char **pp, int (*cb)()); RSA * d2i_Netscape_RSA(RSA **a, const unsigned char **pp, long length, int (*cb)());

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: These functions decode and encode an RSA private key in NET format. These functions are present to provide compatibility with very old software. This format has some severe security weaknesses and should be avoided if possible.
These functions are similar to the d2i_RSAPrivateKey functions.
